title: Tragedy Strikes Rockland Community
body: Reb Yisroel Meir Freeman z”l, a 29-year-old yungerman and father of three, was niftar in a horrific accident on his way to kollel. He was from Boro Park and the beloved son of East Side Hatzolah.

title: Chareidi Draft Enforcement
body: Israel's High Court demands the state implement a strict enforcement system against chareidi draft non-compliance, ordering immediate action against those who refuse to report for the draft.
